actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

actions.subcommittee: International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services.
Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services

official_title: A bill to designate the building of the United States Postal Service located at 5 Cedar Street in Hopkinton, Massachusetts, as the "Thomas J. Brown Post Office Building".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. Postal Service building located at 5 Cedar Street in Hopkinton, Massachusetts, as the Thomas J. Brown Post Office Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the building of the United States Postal Service located at 5 Cedar Street in Hopkinton, Massachusetts, as the "Thomas J. Brown Post Office Building".
